exceptions.exn: The reference filterlim_RInt was not found in the current environment.
The reference lu was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Hfst : R -> V Hsnd, x, k : R x0 : V H0 : is_RInt Hfst Hsnd x x0 Unable to unify "forall P : ?U -> Prop, ?G P -> filtermap ?M2689 ?F P" with "exists If : V, is_RInt (fun y : R => scal k (Hfst y)) Hsnd x If".

original: intros Hfst Hsnd. eapply filterlim_RInt. intros x. exists (lu, lv). split; [apply Hfst | apply Hsnd]. apply filterlim_ext. intros t. unfold f at 1. now destruct (f t) as [u v]. apply filterlim_plus.
